name: My Circle Golf
description: My Circle Golf provides a mobile platform where lapsed or occasional golfers can organize games with friends or completely new partners. Our platform allows them to connect through golf ability, education or professional background and helps them find and arrange games at suitable venues, removing any barriers preventing them from playing more.

team.title: Founder & CEO
team.name: Gian Paolo Ziletti
team.bioHtml: Founder @My Circle Golf ; worked @Deloitte Consulting , @KPMG and @Accenture, studied @University of Cambridge

jobs.title: Head of Marketing
jobs.description:
Your role
• CMO
• Marketing Strategy
• In-bound & Out-bound marketing
• Community Management, CRM
• SEO, SMO, Online advertisement
• Email marketing via Mailchimp
• Be strategic partner to CEO in developing the future of our business
• Strong dialogue with customers ensuring a user-focused development of our services
• Growth, growth, growth

Requirements
• Excellent academic background (M.Sc. or PhD) in Business, Marketing or related field
• Extensive experience of online marketing, CRM, customer relations
• Entrepreneurial spirit and a hands-on attitude, contributing from day 1 and manage the
growth of our infrastructure
• You understand the needs of our users and can translate that into product features, marketing activities to attract and retain users
• Creative, solution focused, motivational leader
• Winning personality with a positive attitude
• Team player
• You communicate effectively on all levels in- and outside the company
• Native/fluent in English, additional language(s) are a plus
• Based in London
• Passion for golf

Responsibilities:
• Developing marketing funnel from leads to conversion
• Planning marketing campaigns that resonate with our core target audience
• Growth hacking marketing channels
• Ensuring customer base is growing month-on-month 
• Testing, tracking and optimising campaigns and marketing activities


No recruiters, agencies or managed/outsourced companies.

Together with the founder, you will be integral to our fundraising efforts. After a successful first round of fundraising, targeted to be completed in 2017, the successful you will receive a salary and part of the equity. Before the fund raising you will be paid on a contract basis

IMPORTANT – don’t just send a generic cover letter or CV – I want to hear why you’re interested in growing My Circle Golf with me, what relevant experience you have, and a little bit about who you are.
